name: Pong (itch) (MIJ Games)
description:
A Simple Pong Game, made in Pygame.

This could be played against A.I, or with another Player.

To move your Player1 use UP and DOWN keys in A.I and Multiplayer both.

To move 2nd Player in Multiplayer mode use W and S keys.

This game is completely made by Solo GameDev.

But Fonts used in this (Joystix monospace) are by Ray Larabie check him out Typodermic Fonts.
